title: Spotify 's premium subscribers 2015 to 2019
summary: This is a bar chart representing Quarter in the x axis and Paying subscribers in millions in the y axis.
The Paying subscribers in millions is appeared to be the highest at Quarter Q4 2019 and lowest at Quarter Q1 2015.
The difference of Paying subscribers in millions between the highest and lowest Quarter is 106.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Paying subscribers in millions for 20 number of Quarters.
Quarter Q4 2019 has the highest Paying subscribers in millions and Q1 2015 has the lowest Paying subscribers in millions.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Quarter in the x axis and Paying subscribers in millions in the y axis.
The Paying subscribers in millions is appeared to be the highest at Quarter Q4 2019 and lowest at Quarter Q1 2015.
The difference of Paying subscribers in millions between the highest and lowest Quarter is 106.0.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Quarter in the x axis and Paying subscribers in millions in the y axis.
The Paying subscribers in millions is appeared to be the highest at Quarter Q4 2019 and lowest at Quarter Q1 2015.
Quarter  has the second highest value for Paying subscribers in millions.
The difference of Paying subscribers in millions between the highest and lowest Quarter is 106.0.
Paying subscribers in millions at Quarter Q4 2019 is 124.0 , second place is  at 124.0, and thirdly is Q2 2019 at 108.0.
Overall Paying subscribers in millions has declined over the Quarters.
Considered together, the average Paying subscribers in millions in all 20 Quarters is roughly 63.8.
The Paying subscribers in millions is 1276.0 if we add up values of all Quarters.
